languages.text: "В таком виде он бесполезен. Давай извлечем из него выгоду, пусть вербует новичков для нас".
"He is of no use in this state. Let us draw what benefit we can from him — he can recruit new Shriekers for us."
languages.original_text: "В таком виде он бесполезен. Давай извлечем из него выгоду, пусть вербует новичков для нас".

traits.locale_text: "He is of no use in this state. Let us draw what benefit we can from him — he can recruit new Shriekers for us."
"He is of no use in this state. Let us draw what benefit we can from him — he can recruit new Shriekers for us."
"He is of no use in this state. Let us draw what benefit we can from him — he can recruit new Shriekers for us."
"He is of no use in this state. Let us draw what benefit we can from him — he can recruit new Shriekers for us."

languages.text: “他这个样子派不上任何用场。我们可以看看能让他做些什么有用的事情，他可以为我们招募新的尖啸者。”
languages.original_text: "He is of no use in this state. Let us draw what benefit we can from him — he can recruit new Shriekers for us."

traits.locale_text: “他这个样子派不上任何用场。我们可以看看能让他做些什么有用的事情，他可以为我们招募新的尖啸者。”

languages.text: «En este estado no nos sirve de nada. Aprovechemos lo que podamos: servirá para reclutar nuevos Aulladores».
languages.original_text: "He is of no use in this state. Let us draw what benefit we can from him — he can recruit new Shriekers for us."

traits.locale_text: «En este estado no nos sirve de nada. Aprovechemos lo que podamos: servirá para reclutar nuevos Aulladores».

languages.text: 「この状態では我々にとってなんの使い道にならない。こいつに新しいシュリーカーを勧誘してもらうのはどうだろうか」
languages.original_text: "He is of no use in this state. Let us draw what benefit we can from him — he can recruit new Shriekers for us."

traits.locale_text: 「この状態では我々にとってなんの使い道にならない。こいつに新しいシュリーカーを勧誘してもらうのはどうだろうか」

languages.text: "In diesem Zustand ist er nicht von Nutzen. Für eines mag er aber taugen — er kann neue Kreischer für uns rekrutieren."
languages.original_text: "He is of no use in this state. Let us draw what benefit we can from him — he can recruit new Shriekers for us."

traits.locale_text: "In diesem Zustand ist er nicht von Nutzen. Für eines mag er aber taugen — er kann neue Kreischer für uns rekrutieren."

languages.text: « Il ne nous sera d'aucune utilité dans cet état. Tirons ce que nous pouvons de lui : il peut nous aider à recruter de nouveaux Hurleurs. »
languages.original_text: "He is of no use in this state. Let us draw what benefit we can from him — he can recruit new Shriekers for us."

traits.locale_text: « Il ne nous sera d'aucune utilité dans cet état. Tirons ce que nous pouvons de lui : il peut nous aider à recruter de nouveaux Hurleurs. »

languages.text: "Bu hâlde bir işe yaramaz. Ondan faydalanabildiğimiz kadar faydalanalım. Yardımı sayesinde yeni Çığırtkanlar bulabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "He is of no use in this state. Let us draw what benefit we can from him — he can recruit new Shriekers for us."

traits.locale_text: "Bu hâlde bir işe yaramaz. Ondan faydalanabildiğimiz kadar faydalanalım, derim. Yeni Çığırtkanlar bulmamızı sağlayabilir."
